name: Spicy Tofu Salad Bowl
author: tamzie
summary: When it's too hot or when I don't feel like cooking, I'll make this quick healthy bowl. Sometimes I just eat it as a salad without rice and sometimes I mix a spoonful of the spicy paste with the steam rice and eat it.
ingredients: 1 ½ teaspoons Korean chile pepper powder, or to taste
½ teaspoon toasted Asian sesame oil
½  head of romaine lettuce (heart only), torn into bite-size pieces
½  cucumber - peeled, seeded, and chopped
directions: Mix green onions, soy sauce, sesame seeds, Korean red pepper powder, sugar, and sesame oil together in a bowl until evenly combined
Place rice in a serving bowl
Toss lettuce and cucumber together and place onto rice
Arrange tofu over lettuce and cucumber
Drizzle sesame mixture over tofu to taste
